Room.Name: Orphanage Cellar
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the cellar of the Oceancrest Orphanage.
Room.LongDescription: The room is dark and musty, with a strong smell of soap and dirty clothes. Clutter abounds, and the floor is covered with boxes and stacks of odd items. When kids are brought to the orphanage, most of the stuff they had with them is placed down here, out of the way. The only person who ever comes down here, though, is a nasty old caretaker whom the children fear and hate. They tell tales to anyone who will listen that he has turned bad children into soap, by rendering them in a large vat down here.
